about_the_game:
Solve the mysteries of the strange labyrinth as you help Neffy break the seal on the lunar goddess!

Neffy -Moonlight Labyrinth- is a single-player action puzzle game.
Embark on an adventure with Neffy, who summons you to a 360-degree labyrinth.

■Main Character 1:Neffy
Players can control Neffy.
You can move, jump, open treasure chests, and perform other actions to reach the goal.

■Main Character 2: Novalis
This is your form summoned to another world by Neffy.
Compared to Neffy, you are much larger and can control various gimmicks in the labyrinth with your hands. The labyrinth is a place where you can use your hands to manipulate the various gimmicks.
You can manipulate these gimmicks, which become obstacles in your adventure, to lead Neffy to the goal.

Also, by touching Neffy, you can send him the power of the moon and transform him into a cat.
By transforming into a cat, Nephi will have more jumping power and will be able to jump onto high places.


■Story
"I've gotta save the lunar goddess! Please lend me your help!"
You open your eyes to find yourself in a strange world, with a cat-eared girl named Neffy slumbering before you.

As you try to rouse her from her sleep, she purrs like a kitten.
"Meoww... Zzz... Meoww... Zzz..."
Light envelops her, and before you know it, she's transformed into a cat!

This world was once under the divine protection of two lunar goddesses.
That is, until the goddess of the red moon rebelled against the goddess of the silver moon, and sealed most of her power inside the labyrinth.
One after another, the lunar priestesses who ventured into the labyrinth fell.
Eventually, the only remaining priestess was an apprentice named Neffy.

But on her own, she has little hope of overcoming the challenges that await within.
And that's where you come in!

Neffy -Moonlight Labyrinth- is an VR action puzzle game.

There is little violent shaking on the screen, so anyone can enjoy it!
Adventure with Neffy and save the world together!

Neffy's probably curled up like a cat right now, waiting for you to join her!

highlighted.name: The three of us will join forces.

name: Neffy -Moonlight Labyrinth-

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS:
  • Processor:
  • Graphics:
  • VR Support:

short_description: Neffy -Moonlight Labyrinth- is a single-player action-puzzle game created specifically for the VR platform.　Summoned to the VR world, you control Neffy, a girl who can transform into a cat, while manipulating the labyrinth's gimmicks to reach the labyrinth's exit.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
